snippet: The unsigned letter purporting to be from Mullah Muhammad Omar was sent last year and also pressed the president to release Taliban prisoners.
abstract: Obama administration officials say that Pres Obama received a message in 2011, purporting to be from elusive Taliban leader Mullah Muhammad Omar, which expressed an interest in opening talks that could end the war in Afghanistan; disclosure of the message comes at a delicate moment, with the administration preparing for the resumption of preliminary negotiations with representatives of the group.
lead_paragraph: The unsigned letter purporting to be from Mullah Muhammad Omar was sent last year and also pressed the president to release Taliban prisoners.
